}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "KD20 MB VER:1.0" and "P/N:71R-KD2006-T810" :are silkscreened on the board.
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/shuttle/shuttle_omninas_kd20 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/shuttle/kd20 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/install-openwrt-on-shuttle-omninas-kd20/70465?u=tmomas |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = oxnas |subtarget = ox820 |arch = arm_mpcore |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |image_too_big = 17.01.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = SDcard, USB 3.0 |comment = GPL sources: http://data.shuttle.eu/~upload/omninas/KD20_20121127.zip; Factory image build disabled with commit b0b7f2b8f3a6bba4 }} Please insert instructions here
